text: Janice Wendell Bethany "Jan" Crouch (March 14, 1938 - May 31, 2016) was an American religious broadcaster. Along with her husband Paul, she co-founded the Trinity Broadcasting Network (TBN). Crouch suffered a massive stroke on May 25, 2016 and was hospitalized. She died in Orlando, Florida on May 31, 2016 from complications of the stroke, aged 78.Trinity Broadcasting Network Co-Founder Jan Crouch Dies at 78 After Suffering Massive Stroke ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American Pentecostals Category:Deaths from stroke Category:People from Alabama Category:Television evangelists
title: Jan Crouch
